resources.string: Movie Arena is the worlds most popular and authoritative source for movie, TV and celebrity content, designed to help fans explore the world of movies and shows and decide what to watch.Our searchable database includes millions of movies, TV and entertainment programs and cast and crew members. We help you jog your memory about a movie, show, or person on the tip of your tongue, find the best movie or show to watch next, and empower you to share your entertainment knowledge and opinions with the worldâ€™s largest community of fans.
